My Role As Tech Advisor At Birdly (YCombinator W16)

14 March 2016

Birdly, the company I helped getting accepted into a famous parisian accelerator more than a year ago, has been accepted to take part in the YCombinator program. It’s a great news, and I figured I’d take the opportunity to share what’s my ongoing relation with them at this point.

Since you scrolled this far, you might as well take a look at some other things I wrote !

  • Outsourcing In A Startup
